hotels.title: Five-Star Provence Relais & Châteaux Luxury with Onsite Winery & Vineyards
hotels.description: Step into a world where 18th-century charm and contemporary luxuries collide at the five-star Château de Fonscolombe, Provence. Part of the prestigious Relais & Châteaux collection, this immaculately restored retreat is set deep in the countryside, encircled by renowned vineyards. Framed by fairytale twin turrets, inspired by the region's prestigious history and with vineyards and a winery onsite, this 300-year-old Provençal château invites you to enjoy an opulent retreat once reserved for nobility. Inside, period chinoiserie designs and Italian leather tapestries line its beautiful walls, while canopied beds, sculpted fireplaces and soft colours reflect the chic, rustic Provençal charm of the estate's past. Expect handpainted wallpaper, lavish chandeliers, reclaimed tiles and wrought-iron balconies, as well sweeping vistas across the main courtyard, dovecotes and grounds - dotted with historic statues, a chapel, fountains and a vegetable garden. Stepping outside, you will find an ancient stone pond turned into a swimming pool and an impressive arboretum. In summer, guests may opt to dine under the huge 300-year-old bald cypress, as the property's stylish L'Orangerie restaurant goes alfresco.

hotels.title: Boutique Countryside Retreat in French Provence with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of French elegance at this lavish boutique retreat located in the heart of the Provence region. This countryside paradise is a haven of tranquillity, surrounded by olive groves, cherry trees and lavender fields, offering an authentic taste of the charming French countryside. Unwind at the serene onsite spa, take a dip in one of the sparkling outdoor pools or disconnect with a yoga class among the hotel's aromatic gardens. Savour the flavours of Provence at the Michelin-starred La Bastide restaurant, where dishes are crafted from locally sourced ingredients, or explore the picturesque villages of nearby Bonnieux and Lacoste.
